mapper.select: select -- t1.username,t2.rewardValue,t1.is_verify,t1.id userId t1.username,t2.rewardValue,t1.id userId from bool_user_user t1 inner join ( SELECT sum(reward_value) rewardValue, user_id from bool_user_reward_record group by user_id order by rewardValue desc , user_id asc limit #{start}, #{limit}) t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id
